deck.name: Poison
deck.description: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure!

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: Valkyrie
deck.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

deck.name: Ice Wizard
deck.description: This chill caster throws ice shards that slow down enemies' movement and attack speed. Despite being freezing cold, he has a handlebar mustache that's too hot for TV.

deck.name: Tornado
deck.description: Drags enemy troops to its center while dealing damage over time, just like a magnet. A big, swirling, Tornado-y magnet. Doesn't affect buildings.

deck.name: Cannon Cart
deck.description: A Cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Once you break its shield, it becomes a Cannon not on wheels.

deck.name: Mega Minion
deck.description: Flying, armored and powerful. What could be its weakness?! Cupcakes.

deck.name: Hog Rider
deck.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of "Hog Riderrrrr" all the way through the Arena doors.

deck.name: Bats
deck.description: Spawns a handful of tiny flying creatures. Think of them as sweet, purple... balls of DESTRUCTION!

deck.name: Wizard
deck.description: The most awesome man to ever set foot in the Arena, the Wizard will blow you away with his handsomeness... and/or fireballs.

deck.name: Valkyrie
deck.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

deck.name: Hog Rider
deck.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of "Hog Riderrrrr" all the way through the Arena doors.

deck.name: P.E.K.K.A
deck.description: A heavily armored, slow melee fighter. Swings from the hip, but packs a huge punch.

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Princess
deck.description: This stunning Princess shoots flaming arrows from long range. If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.

deck.name: Cannon Cart
deck.description: A Cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Once you break its shield, it becomes a Cannon not on wheels.

deck.name: Hunter
deck.description: He deals BIG damage up close - not so much at range. What he lacks in accuracy, he makes up for with his impressively bushy eyebrows.

deck.name: Ice Golem
deck.description: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.

deck.name: Ice Spirit
deck.description: Spawns one lively little Ice Spirit to freeze a group of enemies. Stay frosty.

deck.name: Poison
deck.description: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure!

deck.name: Royal Hogs
deck.description: The King's personal pets are loose! They love to chomp on apples and towers alike - who let the hogs out?!

deck.name: Skeletons
deck.description: Three fast, very weak melee fighters. Surround your enemies with this pile of bones!

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Royal Hogs
deck.description: The King's personal pets are loose! They love to chomp on apples and towers alike - who let the hogs out?!

deck.name: Bandit
deck.description: The Bandit dashes to her target and delivers an extra big hit! While dashing, she can't be touched. The mask keeps her identity safe, and gives her bonus cool points!

deck.name: Electro Wizard
deck.description: He lands with a "POW!", stuns nearby enemies and shoots lightning with both hands! What a show off.

deck.name: Mega Knight
deck.description: He lands with the force of 1,000 mustaches, then jumps from one foe to the next dealing huge area damage. Stand aside!

deck.name: Cannon Cart
deck.description: A Cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Once you break its shield, it becomes a Cannon not on wheels.

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: Lava Hound
deck.description: The Lava Hound is a majestic flying beast that attacks buildings. The Lava Pups are less majestic angry babies that attack anything.

deck.name: Balloon
deck.description: As pretty as they are, you won't want a parade of THESE balloons showing up on the horizon. Drops powerful bombs and when shot down, crashes dealing area damage.

deck.name: Mega Minion
deck.description: Flying, armored and powerful. What could be its weakness?! Cupcakes.

deck.name: Flying Machine
deck.description: The Master Builder has sent his first contraption to the Arena! It's a fast and fun flying machine, but fragile!

deck.name: Guards
deck.description: Three ruthless bone brothers with shields. Knock off their shields and all that's left are three ruthless bone brothers.

deck.name: Tombstone
deck.description: Troop building that periodically deploys Skeletons to fight the enemy. When destroyed, spawns 4 Skeletons. Creepy!

deck.description: Spawns three Goblins anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a thrilling ride, boys!

deck.name: Giant
deck.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. A real one-man wrecking crew!

deck.name: Minions
deck.description: Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!

deck.name: Archers
deck.description: A pair of lightly armored ranged attackers. They'll help you take down ground and air units, but you're on your own with hair coloring advice.

deck.name: Valkyrie
deck.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

deck.name: Night Witch
deck.description: Summons Bats to do her bidding, even after death! If you get too close, she isn't afraid of pitching in with her mean-looking battle staff.

deck.name: Mega Knight
deck.description: He lands with the force of 1,000 mustaches, then jumps from one foe to the next dealing huge area damage. Stand aside!

deck.name: Goblin Gang
deck.description: Spawns five Goblins - three with knives, two with spears - at a discounted Elixir cost. It's like a Goblin Value Pack!

deck.name: Arrows
deck.description: Arrows pepper a large area, damaging all enemies hit. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Lumberjack
deck.description: He chops trees by day and hunts The Log by night. His bottle of Rage spills everywhere when he dies.

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: Giant Snowball
deck.description: It's HUGE! Once it began rolling down Frozen Peak, there was no stopping it. Enemies hit are knocked back and slowed down.

deck.name: Minion Horde
deck.description: Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!

deck.name: Furnace
deck.description: The Furnace spawns two Fire Spirits at a time. It also makes great brick-oven pancakes.

deck.name: Heal
deck.description: Heal your troops to keep them in the fight! Friendly troops are healed over time while in the target area. Doesn't affect buildings.

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: P.E.K.K.A
deck.description: A heavily armored, slow melee fighter. Swings from the hip, but packs a huge punch.

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Goblin Barrel
deck.description: Spawns three Goblins anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a thrilling ride, boys!

deck.name: Skeleton Army
deck.description: Spawns an army of Skeletons. Meet Larry and his friends Harry, Gerry, Terry, Mary, etc.

deck.name: Wizard
deck.description: The most awesome man to ever set foot in the Arena, the Wizard will blow you away with his handsomeness... and/or fireballs.

deck.name: Mega Minion
deck.description: Flying, armored and powerful. What could be its weakness?! Cupcakes.

deck.name: Minion Horde
deck.description: Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!

deck.name: Cannon Cart
deck.description: A Cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Once you break its shield, it becomes a Cannon not on wheels.

deck.name: Princess
deck.description: This stunning Princess shoots flaming arrows from long range. If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Goblin Barrel
deck.description: Spawns three Goblins anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a thrilling ride, boys!

deck.name: Goblin Gang
deck.description: Spawns five Goblins - three with knives, two with spears - at a discounted Elixir cost. It's like a Goblin Value Pack!

deck.name: Ice Golem
deck.description: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.

deck.name: Tesla
deck.description: Defensive building. Whenever it's not zapping the enemy, the power of Electrickery is best kept grounded.

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: Golem
deck.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. When destroyed, explosively splits into two Golemites and deals area damage!

deck.name: Elixir Collector
deck.description: You gotta spend Elixir to make Elixir.

deck.name: Electro Wizard
deck.description: He lands with a "POW!", stuns nearby enemies and shoots lightning with both hands! What a show off.

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Mega Knight
deck.description: He lands with the force of 1,000 mustaches, then jumps from one foe to the next dealing huge area damage. Stand aside!

deck.name: Inferno Dragon
deck.description: Shoots a focused beam of fire that increases in damage over time. Wears a helmet because flying can be dangerous.

deck.name: Bandit
deck.description: The Bandit dashes to her target and delivers an extra big hit! While dashing, she can't be touched. The mask keeps her identity safe, and gives her bonus cool points!

deck.name: Bats
deck.description: Spawns a handful of tiny flying creatures. Think of them as sweet, purple... balls of DESTRUCTION!

deck.name: Cannon Cart
deck.description: A Cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Once you break its shield, it becomes a Cannon not on wheels.

deck.name: Princess
deck.description: This stunning Princess shoots flaming arrows from long range. If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Goblin Barrel
deck.description: Spawns three Goblins anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a thrilling ride, boys!

deck.name: Goblin Gang

deck.name: Ice Golem
deck.description: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.

deck.description: Defensive building. Whenever it's not zapping the enemy, the power of Electrickery is best kept grounded.

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: Magic Archer
deck.description: Not quite a Wizard, nor an Archer - he shoots a magic arrow that passes through and damages all enemies in its path. It's not a trick, it's magic!

deck.name: Royal Ghost
deck.description: He drifts invisibly through the Arena until he's startled by an enemy... then he attacks! Then he's invisible again! Zzzz.

deck.name: Cannon Cart
deck.description: A Cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Once you break its shield, it becomes a Cannon not on wheels.

deck.name: Lumberjack
deck.description: He chops trees by day and hunts The Log by night. His bottle of Rage spills everywhere when he dies.

deck.name: Inferno Dragon
deck.description: Shoots a focused beam of fire that increases in damage over time. Wears a helmet because flying can be dangerous.

deck.name: Zappies
deck.description: Spawns a pack of miniature Zap machines. Who controls them...? Only the Master Builder knows.

deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Minions
deck.description: Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!

deck.name: Miner
deck.description: The Miner can burrow his way underground and appear anywhere in the Arena. It's not magic, it's a shovel.

deck.name: Minion Horde
deck.description: Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: Giant
deck.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. A real one-man wrecking crew!

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Night Witch
deck.description: Summons Bats to do her bidding, even after death! If you get too close, she isn't afraid of pitching in with her mean-looking battle staff.

deck.name: Zap

deck.name: Inferno Dragon
deck.description: Shoots a focused beam of fire that increases in damage over time. Wears a helmet because flying can be dangerous.

deck.name: Graveyard
deck.description: Surprise! It's a party. A Skeleton party, anywhere in the Arena. Yay!

deck.name: Tornado
deck.description: Drags enemy troops to its center while dealing damage over time, just like a magnet. A big, swirling, Tornado-y magnet. Doesn't affect buildings.

deck.name: Bowler
deck.description: This big blue dude digs the simple things in life - Dark Elixir drinks and throwing rocks. His massive boulders roll through their target, hitting everything behind for a strike!

deck.name: Electro Wizard
deck.description: He lands with a "POW!", stuns nearby enemies and shoots lightning with both hands! What a show off.

deck.name: Valkyrie
deck.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Mini P.E.K.K.A
deck.description: The Arena is a certified butterfly-free zone. No distractions for P.E.K.K.A, only destruction.

deck.name: Poison
deck.description: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure!

deck.name: Goblin Barrel
deck.description: Spawns three Goblins anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a thrilling ride, boys!

deck.name: Arrows
deck.description: Arrows pepper a large area, damaging all enemies hit. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Hog Rider
deck.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of "Hog Riderrrrr" all the way through the Arena doors.

deck.name: Witch
deck.description: Summons Skeletons, shoots destructo beams, has glowing pink eyes that unfortunately don't shoot lasers.

deck.name: Rascals
deck.description: Spawns a mischievous trio of Rascals! The boy takes the lead, while the girls pelt enemies from behind... with slingshots full of Double Trouble Gum!

deck.name: Lightning
deck.description: Bolts of lightning damage and stun up to three enemy troops or buildings with the most hitpoints in the target area. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Tombstone
deck.description: Troop building that periodically deploys Skeletons to fight the enemy. When destroyed, spawns 4 Skeletons. Creepy!

deck.name: Lava Hound
deck.description: The Lava Hound is a majestic flying beast that attacks buildings. The Lava Pups are less majestic angry babies that attack anything.

deck.name: Knight
deck.description: A tough melee fighter. The Barbarian's handsome, cultured cousin. Rumor has it that he was knighted based on the sheer awesomeness of his mustache alone.

deck.name: Archers
deck.description: A pair of lightly armored ranged attackers. They'll help you take down ground and air units, but you're on your own with hair coloring advice.

deck.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

deck.name: Tornado
deck.description: Drags enemy troops to its center while dealing damage over time, just like a magnet. A big, swirling, Tornado-y magnet. Doesn't affect buildings.

deck.name: Goblins
deck.description: Three fast, unarmored melee attackers. Small, fast, green and mean!

deck.name: Hog Rider
deck.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of "Hog Riderrrrr" all the way through the Arena doors.

deck.name: Ice Spirit
deck.description: Spawns one lively little Ice Spirit to freeze a group of enemies. Stay frosty.

deck.name: Musketeer
deck.description: Don't be fooled by her delicately coiffed hair, the Musketeer is a mean shot with her trusty boomstick.

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
